channel.title: The GLP-1 Research Digest
channel.description: Weekly analysis of the latest GLP-1 and obesity medication research. Hosted by Dan (registered dietitian) and Alex (science journalist).
channel.ns0:author: GLP-1 Research Digest
channel.ns0:summary: Weekly analysis of the latest GLP-1 and obesity medication research for healthcare professionals and informed patients.

item.title: Heart Health Research Digest - 2026-01-21
item.description: This episode covers: Associations Between the Cardiovascular Health Diet Index (CHDI) and Cardiometabolic Risk Factors in; 2026 Heart Disease and Stroke Statistics: A Report of US and Global Data From the American Heart Ass; Lifestyle factors and cardiometabolic risk.; Evaluating Cardiovascular Disease Risk.; Berberine Reduces Atrial Lipotoxicity and Endoplasmic Reticulum Stress to Alleviate Heart Failure Wi

item.title: GLP-1 Research Digest - 2026-01-21
item.description: This week's research roundup covers: Nutritional and lifestyle supportive care recommendations for management of obesity with GLP-1 - bas; Micronutrient and Nutritional Deficiencies Associated With GLP-1 Receptor Agonist Therapy: A Narrati; GLP-1 physiology and pharmacology along the gut-brain axis.; Development of a Follow-Up Protocol for Patients Treated with Injectable Semaglutide for Weight Loss; Target trial emulations for tirzepatide, semaglutide and SGLT2-inhibitors for dementia in patients w
